labels.common.adminRequired: You don't have the permission to issue this command, it can be used by admins only.
labels.help.chat.say: Sends a message containing the provided text.
labels.help.memberCount.counter: Enables or disables a given counter.
labels.help.memberCount.counterName: Sets the name of a given counter.
labels.help.memberCount.refreshCounters: Starts the asynchronous refresh for every counter's value.
labels.chat.help.commandNotFound: I'm sorry, this command doesn't exist.
labels.memberCount.counter.unsupportedCounter: This kind of counter is not supported.
labels.memberCount.counter.unsupportedOperation: This operation is not supported, you can enable or disable a counter by using the "on" and "off" operations.
labels.memberCount.counter.invalidName: The given counter name is not valid.
